extendedInfo.description: The most classic match-2 game Color Match comes to your phone now. Your mission to eliminate as many blocks as possible in limited time. Very simple game rule# Click on the connect point of same color blocks in empty area to eliminate them. It also means the nearest blocks to connect point, either in horizontal or vertical direction, will be elimanted if they are the same color.WARNING: THIS GAME IS SUPER ADDICTIVE!

reviews.title: Addictive!
reviews.comment: This game is truly addictive and fun.  It challenges you to compete with yourself and get better scores, come up with new strategies.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Color Match
reviews.comment: I really like the concept of matching colors; it keeps you on your toes! Unfortunately, its not for the color-blind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: magnificent
reviews.comment: this is one of my favourite games. its simple and very addicting. but there should me more levels. love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun, but needs Untimed Option
reviews.comment: & maybe a chunk of time is restored with every block you match when timer hits red zone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: One the practice one they should give u more time or block the time. I would love to try and clear the board, but other than that its a great game!

reviews.title: Colorful
reviews.comment: It\'s a really fun game to play animation wise; I just wish there was more of a level-like structure
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive!
reviews.comment: I can\'t seem to stop playing but I def agree there should be longer timer options. Great game though...very fun.  :)

reviews.title: Color Match
reviews.comment: Color match. I love this  game is one of my favorites.  It\'s very addicting, can\'t put it down after u start playing it.

reviews.title: Oddly addicting
reviews.comment: It wouldn\'t seem that it would take up so much of my time. But I often find myself unable to put it down.

reviews.title: Colour match
reviews.comment: Great game. should have the lines the colour of the blocks u matched but it\'s so addictive al the same :-D

reviews.title: Neat and different
reviews.comment: Addictive - needs levels and  more time for 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Chuchin
reviews.comment: Silly fun game to challenge you ability to think quickly. Fun. The timer is annoying, too fast.  Have never been able to win.
reviews.author: susan smiddy

reviews.title: Very addicting
reviews.comment: Seems simple, but the clock counts down quick!
reviews.author: Ryans threetwentythree i

reviews.title: No time.
reviews.comment: This game only gives you 10 seconds to play. Can\'t get anywhere. Very frustrating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good for wasting time
reviews.comment: Gets addicting but has too few options for time. Once the game is mastered there\'s no option to spice it up at all or make it easier for non adults to play. All that aside it is a challenge. As a side note some of the blue colors are a little difficult to distinguish if they aren\'t relatively close to each other, but maybe that\'s just me and old age kicking in....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: COLOR MATCH
reviews.comment: It\'s fun, but time is short.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but too fast
reviews.comment: I wish there was a way to play slowly just to clear the board untimed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Color match
reviews.comment: Good game, wish I had more time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very fun. Highly addictive. I enjoy it and can play with my 8 year old Granddaughter and feel we are both being mentally challenged in a healthy way.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Bomb
reviews.comment: Lots, and lots of fun. Wish I could add a couple of seconds!!! Lol...
